name: BigQuery Cost Estimator
description: The price of BigQuery export can be calculated based on the traffic and storage volume. The price depends on the location of the resource. Default values are provided for location EU (multi-region), for different locations values can be found on https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/pricing.

constants.name: priceConfig
constants.description: Settings of the prices for Big Query price calculation

constants.name: expectedQueryUnits
constants.description: Expected amount of queries in TiB units

constants.name: expectedEventSize
constants.description: Expected size of events in kiB units

blocks.description: Calculate the estimated monthly price for Big Query export
